name: Splat Monster: splat the monsters, avoid the bombs
name_original: Splat Monster: splat the monsters, avoid the bombs
description:
Splat Monster: no more splatting fruit, splat the monsters and avoid the bombs! This simple and addictive arcade game is just for you. Cute and fun! Show your ability!

Special Features
 Multiplayer! - show your skills
 Challenge Friends - share your score online!
 Achievements - unlock new levels!
 Gameplay Statistics - climb the leader board and be the best

Splat Monster is completely free to play! Enjoy!

WHAT'S NEW
Hello Monsters lovers! This one is a big one! A lot of new features just for you:
• Multiplayer! 
• Custom Leaderboards
• Challenge Friends
• Achievements
• Gameplay Statistics
• Share Scores to Facebook and Twitter
• Encouraging Messages
• Clever Notifications
Thanks for you support and keep on giving us those amazing five stars rates!
